sentence: That includes former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson, Norton Shores businesswoman Tudor Dixon, Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley, Oakland County pastor Ralph Rebandt, Livingston County evangelist Bob Scott, and Grand Rapids businesswoman Donna Brandenburg.

title: Donald Trump rally in Michigan on Saturday, April 2: Everything you need to know

sentence: Brown, as well as financial adviser Michael Markey, former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, businesswoman Donna Brandenburg and self-described quality guru Perry Johnson, all had signatures that the bureau recommended to be deemed insufficient as many were fraudulent.
title: GOP candidates deemed ineligible as massive signature fraud scandal upends Michigan gubernatorial race

sentence: Those deemed ineligible included Johnson, Craig, Markey, Donna Brandenburg and Michael Brown, who immediately withdrew from the governor's race.
author: Amy B Wang
title: Mich. GOP candidate ruled ineligible for ballot after fraudulent petitions
